hero.description: Data Scientist with over 5 years of experience in machine learning, A/B testing, and product analytics. Proven track record optimizing mobile gaming products and digital advertising platforms through data-driven solutions.

about.subtitle: Curious by nature, eager to dive deep into problems to break them down and build improved solutions
about.professionalSummary: I specialize in combining expertise in Python, SQL, and cloud computing to enhance business metrics and product performance. My experience spans mobile gaming analytics, digital advertising optimization, and natural language processing for Slavic languages. With over 5 years in the field, I've worked across diverse domains from real-time bidding platforms to mobile gaming LiveOps, always focusing on data-driven decision making and measurable impact.

technicalExpertise.coreSkills: Python, SQL, Machine Learning, A/B Testing, Product Analytics
technicalExpertise.specializations: Cloud Computing, NLP, Real-time Bidding Systems, Data Pipelines, Statistical Analysis

about.interests: Passionate about turning complex data into actionable insights. I enjoy tackling challenging problems in mobile gaming analytics and building robust experimentation frameworks. Always eager to learn new technologies and methodologies to improve data-driven decision making.

description: Lead product analytics initiatives focusing on app performance optimization

Built the system architecture from the ground up

education.description: Studied abroad in Prague, Czech Republic, wrote my thesis on generalization analysis of semantic segmentation with deep filter banks
